name: THAT LIZARD STOLE MY LUNCH
description:
Hey, just so you know this is my failed game so read the stuff below before playing :)

I started out with a specific thing that I wanted to make and I didn’t live up to it design wise which you can read about over here.

It’s still working though, there are 5 challenges and a tutorial so you might have some fun with it.

Whether you are a game designer or not, if you do play it, I suggest you think about where it falls short and learn something like I did.

Also check out all the awesome eggs that agreed to play test while I was making the game https://happysnakegames.itch.io/that-lizard-stole-my-lunch/devlog/26158/play-tes... thank you all so much!

p.s donations are only open to support me, not for the game.
